extensions.name: dvirtz.parquet-viewer
extensions.description: Allows users to view Apache Parquet files directly within Visual Studio Code, providing an easy way to inspect large data files without leaving the editor.

extensions.name: ms-mssql.data-workspace-vscode
extensions.description: Provides a unified data project management experience in VS Code, enabling users to organize and manage database projects and data connections.

extensions.name: ms-mssql.mssql
extensions.description: Enables database development directly from VS Code, allowing you to connect to SQL Server, Azure SQL Database, and SQL Data Warehouse, and run queries.

extensions.name: ms-mssql.sql-database-projects-vscode
extensions.description: Supports SQL database project management and development, facilitating source control integration and an organized approach to database development.

extensions.name: ms-toolsai.jupyter
extensions.description: Integrates Jupyter Notebook support into VS Code, allowing you to create, edit, and run Jupyter notebooks within the editor.

extensions.name: ms-toolsai.jupyter-keymap
extensions.description: Provides Jupyter Notebook keymap extensions for VS Code, enabling familiar keyboard shortcuts for those accustomed to Jupyter's interface.

extensions.name: ms-toolsai.jupyter-renderers
extensions.description: Adds additional output renderers for Jupyter notebooks in VS Code, enhancing the visualization of notebook outputs.

extensions.name: ms-toolsai.vscode-jupyter-cell-tags
extensions.description: Allows users to add, edit, and manage tags on Jupyter notebook cells directly within VS Code, improving notebook organization and navigation.

extensions.name: ms-toolsai.vscode-jupyter-slideshow
extensions.description: Enables the creation of slide shows from Jupyter notebooks within VS Code, facilitating presentations and educational content creation.

extensions.name: paiqo.databricks-vscode
extensions.description: Provides seamless integration with Databricks, allowing you to develop and deploy Databricks notebooks, jobs, and workflows directly from VS Code.

extensions.name: ms-azuretools.vscode-cosmosdb
extensions.description: Connect Azure CosmosDB databases in Azure, inspect and edit your data and run powerful queries with the visual query editor..
